p: Today, cultivation of vegetables and several other crops are facing many problems such as temperature increase, low availability of high quality water and soil salinization; these problems are attributable to climate change [ 7]. In this context, it is most important to have the possibility of proposing alternative crops, such as halophyte species, since they can better adapt under hard conditions, becoming suitable candidates as emerging cash crop and/or medicinal plants [ 8, 9, 10].
